signin-message:
In order to fully experience all the content,
make sure you sign in first.
section1-text2: Every day after this update, you will be able to get the Lucky Draw Box again. We updated this box with all new prizes.
section1-text3: This will only last until February 28th, so grab your new ones now.
section2-text1:
Cupid has landed and brought some new items for
every mercanary in an all new package.
section3-text1: Cupid has brought over more than just love for this update. He is bringing back some Valentine's items to the shop with him.
section4-text2: Grab your BAE and bring them to hang out on our modified Panic Space. What is more romantic than killing your enemies with your Bae?
section4-text3: Sweet Space will be boosted until it is removed from the server.
section5-text3: Enjoy 200% EXP & 300% BP Boost on some of our most played Maps on BlackShot for this season of Love.
